html: Weird Al has one request: "Please don't pickaxe my star. I know it's all the rage these days, but that's not cool. Unless at some point in the future, I do something unfathomably monstrous and evil in which case, sure, fine, okay, go ahead"pic.twitter.com/anFQn6lFla
text: Weird Al has one request: "Please don't pickaxe my star. I know it's all the rage these days, but that's not cool. Unless at some point in the future, I do something unfathomably monstrous and evil in which case, sure, fine, okay, go ahead"pic.twitter.com/anFQn6lFla

html: Hey, Los Angeles! Tomorrow morning at 11:30 I’m getting my star on the Walk of Fame (6914 Hollywood Blvd). I’ll be speaking along with my pals @drdemento and @thomaslennon. Come on out and help us celebrate, won’t you??

html: Congratulations @alyankovic on your well-deserved star! You're right across the street from the Chinese Theater? I'm right next to Minnie Mouse in front of the El Capitan Theater... that makes us neighbors! #WelcomeToTheNeighborhood https://twitter.com/alyankovic/status/1029071422977495051 …
text: Congratulations @alyankovic on your well-deserved star!  You're right across the street from the Chinese Theater? I'm right next to Minnie Mouse in front of the El Capitan Theater... that makes us neighbors! #WelcomeToTheNeighborhood https://twitter.com/alyankovic/status/1029071422977495051 …

html: The time has finally come… On Aug. 27 at 11:30 AM I’ll be getting my very own star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame (6914 Hollywood Blvd., right across the street from the Chinese Theatre). The ceremony is FREE and open to the public, so come on down!!
text: The time has finally come… On Aug. 27 at 11:30 AM I’ll be getting my very own star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame (6914 Hollywood Blvd., right across the street from the Chinese Theatre). The ceremony is FREE and open to the public, so come on down!!

html: Ladies and Gentlemen, that is a WRAP on the Ridiculously Self-Indulgent, Ill-Advised Vanity Tour. Most fun tour ever. Well, for ME anyway! Huge thanks to everybody who came out to see it... Let's do it again sometime!
text: Ladies and Gentlemen, that is a WRAP on the Ridiculously Self-Indulgent, Ill-Advised Vanity Tour.  Most fun tour ever.  Well, for ME anyway!  Huge thanks to everybody who came out to see it... Let's do it again sometime!

html: Fantastic night watching Weird Al downtown at the Ace Hotel. What a fantastic talent he has, and such a voice. Impressive and enviable. He is funny, fresh and brilliant. Masterly control. Thx for the tickets @alyankovic we look forward to seeing you when you are home again.
text: Fantastic night watching Weird Al downtown at the Ace Hotel.  What a fantastic talent he has, and such a voice.  Impressive and enviable.  He  is funny, fresh and brilliant. Masterly control. Thx for the tickets @alyankovic we look forward to seeing you when you are home again.
